PageTitle: Online office suite for Jira | ONLYOFFICE
PageDescription: Edit and co-edit documents, create fillable forms within Jira
Subheader: Work on all kinds of office documents within Jira Software using ONLYOFFICE Docs
WorkWithinConnector: Edit and co-author office documents within the Jira interface
DocumentsTab1Label: View, edit and co-edit office files attached to tasks right within your Jira dashboard.
DocumentsTab2Label: Create and edit text documents, spreadsheets, and presentations.
DocumentsTab3Label: Collaborate on documents with your colleagues in real-time.
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Jira
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE app for Jira now from the Atlassian Marketplace.
Reason1: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>, fully compatible with MS Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
Reason2: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. Integrated <0>AI helper.</0>
Reason3: Real-time and paragraph-locking <0>co-editing</0>, review, version history, document comparison, comments & chat. Audio and video calls.
Reason4: <0>Enhanced security.</0> Flexible access rights and JWT. Watermarking and password protection. Open source code.
Reason5: <0>Easy configuration</0> from the Jira administration panel. Seamless integration with ready-to-use connector from the <1>Atlassian Marketplace</1>. Available for Jira Server and Data Center.
Reason6: Cloud and self-hosted solution for total control over your data. Scalable Enterprise versions. <0>Free 30-day trial</0>.
HowToStartStep1: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> on your own server or create <1>Docs Cloud</1> account.
HowToStartStep2: Get the ONLYOFFICE connector from the <0>Atlassian Marketplace</0>.
HowToStartStep3: Configure the connector and enable JWT.
ReadDetailedInstructions: Read detailed instructions in the <0>Help Center</0>.
HowToConnect: How to integrate ONLYOFFICE Docs and Jira Software
NeedAnAppToConnect: Need an app to connect ONLYOFFICE to your favorite web service? Or have you developed one?
